name: Splice
body:
### Installation

This library is available on Hackage as [`splice`](http://hackage.haskell.org/package/splice)!

```
cabal update
cabal install splice
```

### PortFusion ]-[ayabusa (はやぶさ) (Hayabusa)

This work is funded by [Corsis Research](http://corsis.eu) for the development of [PortFusion \]-\[ayabusa (はやぶさ) (Hayabusa)](https://sourceforge.net/p/portfusion/wiki/RoadMap/) – German-Japanese joint research project for building the simplest and most concise high-performance distributed reverse / forward proxy possible.

```
Copyright © 2012 Cetin Sert. PortFusion is a trademark of corsis.eu.
```

[![Corsis Research](https://sourceforge.net/p/portfusion/wiki/Home/attachment/l100.png)](http://fusion.corsis.eu)
tagline: A Haskell library that implements most efficient socket to socket data transfer loops for proxy servers on each operating system.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
